plot: A film about a repressed farmer's daughter in a conservative community who is learning how to free herself, physically and emotionally, through a lesbian affair with a migrant worker.
title: Marie
plot_es: A film about a repressed farmer's daughter in a conservative community who is learning how to free herself, physically and emotionally, through a lesbian affair with a migrant worker.
plot_en: A film about a repressed farmer's daughter in a conservative community who is learning how to free herself, physically and emotionally, through a lesbian affair with a migrant worker.
